category: news
title: "AI investment dollars: How much money healthcare organizations are pouring into new projects"
excerpt: "Nearly three out of four healthcare organizations anticipate increasing their artificial intelligence tech and software funding this year, according to an Oct. 22 report from Deloitte. Deloitte's 2020 State of AI in the Enterprise Study examines how healthcare organizations are adopting and managing AI technologies as well as benefits they have experienced."
